item.title: 贸易战促使市场预计加拿大将大幅降息
item.description: 由于加拿大经济面临与美国长期贸易争端的前景，很可能导致经济衰退，市场开始对加拿大央行更大幅度的降息进行定价。【原文：Markets are starting to price in deeper rate cuts from the Bank of Canada as the economy faces the prospect of a lengthy trade dispute with the US that would likely cause a recession.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯访问南部边境，五角大楼协助推动移民工作
item.description: 国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）前往美国与墨西哥边境，这是他作为五角大楼负责人的首次出访，他强调愿意让军队参与驱逐和移民执法工作。【原文：Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth headed to the US border with Mexico for his first trip as Pentagon chief, emphasizing his willingness to involve the military in deportations and immigration enforcement.】

item.title: 索尼升级与哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）的 "危险！"之争，称将接管该节目
item.description: 索尼集团公司通知派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）的哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）分部，它将接管《幸运之轮》（Wheel of Fortune）和《危险！》（Jeopardy!【原文：Sony Group Corp. notified Paramount Global’s CBS division that it’s taking over worldwide distribution of Wheel of Fortune and Jeopardy!, two of TV’s most popular game shows, amid an escalating fight between the companies.】

item.title: 债券交易商在通胀保值债券供应问题上针锋相对
item.description: 一小撮华尔街交易员说，美国财政部是时候恢复增加其 30 年期通胀保值债券的拍卖规模了。【原文：A small coterie of Wall Street dealers say it’s time for the US Treasury to resume increasing the size of its 30-year inflation-protected bond auctions.】

item.description: 据知情人士透露，空中客车公司（Airbus SE）已聘请高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Airbus SE has hired Goldman Sachs Group Inc. for advice on an effort to forge a new European space and satellite company that can better compete with Elon Musk’s dominant SpaceX, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克在财政问题上的举动有可能引发有关美国支付违约的争论
item.description: 除了美国财政部在等待国会采取行动提高债务限额的同时减少现金储备的情况外，债券市场参与者通常不会太关注财政部的支付处理部门。【原文：Outside of occasions when the US Treasury is running down its cash pile while awaiting congressional action to raise the debt limit, bond market participants don’t typically pay much attention to the department’s payments-processing division.】

item.title: 利率下行压力再起，交易员急于确保贷款 ETF 的安全性
item.description: 上周，投资者向两只杠杆贷款 ETF 投入了创纪录的现金，赌美联储迟迟不会降息。【原文：Investors plowed record cash into a pair of leveraged loan ETFs last week, in a high-conviction bet that the Federal Reserve will be slow to slashing interest rates.】

item.title: 拉沃罗称巴西农作物投入品零售商面临资金困境
item.description: 据 Lavoro Ltd.称，在流动性日益紧张的情况下，农业强国巴西的化肥和农药供应商正面临着更难补充库存的问题。【原文：Suppliers of fertilizers and pesticides in agricultural powerhouse Brazil are facing a harder time replenishing their inventories amid mounting liquidity constraints, according to Lavoro Ltd.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克表示希望在下次降息前等待一段时间
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，继去年降息后，他希望在再次降息前再等 "一段时间"，因为美国经济在 2025 年的走向还不明朗。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he wants to wait “a while” before cutting interest rates again following last year’s reductions amid uncertainty over where the US economy is headed in 2025.】

item.title: 肯尼亚财政部长登上讲坛，为预算争取支持
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部长对今年的预算不抱任何侥幸心理。【原文：Kenya’s treasury secretary is taking no chances with this year’s budget.】

item.title: 华尔街押注股市将 "驯服 "特朗普，终获回报
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普一当选总统，华尔街就下了这样的赌注。尽管特朗普威胁要对美国的盟友和竞争对手征收关税，但股票守夜人们对他是否会做出真正损害股市的举动持怀疑态度。【原文：It’s the bet Wall Street made as soon as Donald Trump was elected president. For all the threats of tariffs against US allies and rivals, stock vigilantes were skeptical that he’d do anything to really damage the stock market.】

item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 特朗普与马杜罗达成协议，委内瑞拉债券创六个月新高
item.description: 在委内瑞拉政府与白宫达成协议后，委内瑞拉债券跳涨，使人们更加乐观地认为，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府正在软化其对这个政治敌人的立场。【原文：Venezuela bonds jumped after the government reached a deal with the White House, adding to optimism that President Donald Trump’s administration is softening its stance toward the political foe.】

item.title: 保罗-都铎-琼斯称特朗普执政时期的宏观环境 "岌岌可危
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者保罗-都铎-琼斯（Paul Tudor Jones）说，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普挑起全球贸易战，宣布对该国一些最密切的贸易伙伴征收关税后，"从宏观角度看，经济环境岌岌可危"。【原文：Billionaire investor Paul Tudor Jones said the economic environment is “precariously perched from a macro standpoint” after US President Donald Trump kicked off a global trade war, announcing tariffs on some of the country’s closest trading partners.】

item.title: 伊拉克油田发生火灾，欧佩克上月产量下降
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，伊拉克最大油田发生火灾后，欧佩克的石油产量在上个月有所下降。【原文：OPEC’s oil production edged lower last month following a fire at Iraq’s biggest oil field, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 斯坦查特首席执行官温特斯将在财富关注度上升之际访问印度
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）首席执行官比尔-温特斯（Bill Winters）将于本周访问印度，这家总部位于伦敦的银行正努力加强其在南亚国家的业务。【原文：Bill Winters, chief executive officer of Standard Chartered Plc, will visit India this week as the London-based lender seeks to bolster its presence in the South Asian country.】

item.title: 柯林斯称美联储可 "看穿 "关税价格的初步冲击
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，只要官员们没有看到通胀持续走高的信号，美国央行就不太可能对关税对价格的影响做出反应。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said the US central bank is unlikely to react to the impact of tariffs on prices so long as officials don’t see signals of higher, persistent inflation.】

item.title: T.T Rowe Price与Ares支持的保险公司达成资产管理协议
item.description: T.罗尔集团与阿斯必达控股公司（Aspida Holdings）建立了资产管理合作伙伴关系，阿斯必达控股公司是一家人寿保险和年金提供商，也得到了另类投资公司战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. entered into an asset-management partnership with Aspida Holdings, a life insurance and annuity provider that’s also backed by alternative-investment firm Ares Management Corp.】

item.title: 债券交易员增加对加拿大央行紧急降息的赌注
item.description: 加拿大短期利率交易商已开始考虑加拿大央行紧急降息的可能性，以缓解美国表示将于周二生效的关税对经济的影响。【原文：Traders of Canadian short-term interest rates have begun to price in meaningful odds of an emergency cut by the Bank of Canada to blunt the economic impact of tariffs the US said will take effect Tuesday.】

item.title: 杠杆以太坊 ETF 在关税大跌中跳水 46%，创历史新高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新的贸易战炮火中，以太币遭到抛售，这导致寻求提供两倍于以太币每日表现的杠杆 ETF 基金出现了有史以来最大的暴跌。【原文：A leveraged ETF seeking to offer two-times the daily performance of Ether clocked its biggest-ever plunge as the token sold off amid President Donald Trump’s latest trade-war salvo.】

item.title: 新日铁、美国钢铁公司将拜登阻止合并归咎于政治因素
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件，新日本钢铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.）和美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.）将前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）阻止他们计划中的 141 亿美元合并案的决定归咎于政治和失败的审查程序。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. and United States Steel Corp. blamed politics and a failed review process for former President Joe Biden’s decision to block their planned $14.1 billion merger, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 莫迪的特朗普战略：快速让步以避免贸易战
item.description: 很少有国家能比印度更快地安抚美国总统唐纳德-特朗普，以避免一场可能具有破坏性的贸易战。【原文：Few countries are moving faster than India to appease US President Donald Trump in an effort to head off a potentially devastating trade war.】

item.title: Boaz Weinstein 失去控制 Baillie Gifford 信托公司的投票权
item.description: Boaz Weinstein 的 Saba Capital 在获得苏格兰成长型投资者 Baillie Gifford 旗下两个投资信托基金控制权的投票中失利，这是这位对冲基金经理针对七家在伦敦上市的公司的竞选活动中遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：Boaz Weinstein’s Saba Capital lost votes to gain control of two investment trusts run by Scottish growth investor Baillie Gifford, the latest setback in the hedge fund manager’s campaign against seven London-listed vehicles.】

item.title: 墨西哥称美国推迟加征关税后谷物反向大涨
item.description: 在墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆表示美国对拉美国家产品征收关税的时间将推迟一个月后，玉米和小麦期货转而上涨。【原文：Corn and wheat futures turned higher after Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said US tariffs on the Latin America country’s products will be delayed by one month.】

item.title: 世卫组织高层就对外援助令回击特朗普
item.description: 世界卫生组织的两位最高级管理人员对唐纳德-特朗普总统退出全球卫生机构并暂停美国对外援助的决定进行了回击。【原文：The two most senior executives at the World Health Organization have hit back at decisions by President Donald Trump to withdraw from the global health agency and suspend US foreign aid.】

item.title: 墨西哥财政部长告诉投资者墨西哥能够承受关税影响
item.description: 墨西哥财政部长表示，墨西哥已采取措施保护本国经济免受美国关税的冲击，当局正在共同努力，以防货币市场的流动性受到影响。【原文：Mexico has taken steps to safeguard its economy from the shock of US tariffs and authorities are working together in case liquidity in the currency market is affected, the country’s finance minister said.】

item.title: 美国制造业活动自 2022 年以来首次扩张
item.description: 随着订单增加和生产加快，上个月美国工厂活动自 2022 年以来首次出现扩张，这表明制造业前景更加光明。【原文：US factory activity expanded last month for the first time since 2022 as orders ramped up and production quickened, pointing to a brighter manufacturing outlook.】

item.title: 尽管美国征税，倍耐力仍将坚持减债目标
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，尽管美国关税威胁到这家意大利轮胎制造商的北美业务，但倍耐力公司（Pirelli & C. SpA）预计将坚持今年的减债目标。【原文：Pirelli & C. SpA expects to stick with its debt reduction targets for this year, notwithstanding looming US tariffs that threaten the Italian tire manufacturer’s North American business, according to people familiar with the matter.】
